long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Summariser: AI-Powered Web Page Summarisation

Update: Now supports reading and listening to summaries in 20 languages including Spanish, German, Russian, Thai etc. Now you can also choose the summary types you need from Short, Long or Bulleted Summaries. 

Instantly distil lengthy web articles into concise, easy-to-read summaries with Smart Summariser. Powered by advanced AI technology, this extension helps you save time and boost productivity by providing quick, accurate summaries of any web page.

Key Features:
• One-Click Summaries: Generate concise summaries of web articles with a single click.
• AI-Powered: Utilises cutting-edge AI to create accurate and coherent summaries.
• Time-Saving: Quickly grasp the main points of long articles without reading through everything.
• User-Friendly: Simple, intuitive interface that seamlessly integrates with your browsing experience.
• Offline Access: Save summaries for later reading, even without an internet connection.
• Privacy-Focused: Your data is processed securely and never stored or shared.

Perfect for:
• Students researching topics quickly
• Professionals staying updated on industry news
• Casual readers who want to browse content efficiently
• Anyone looking to save time whilst staying informed

Smart Summariser helps you cut through information overload, allowing you to absorb key information from web content faster than ever before. Whether you're conducting research, catching up on news, or simply trying to manage your daily information intake, Smart Summariser is your go-to tool for efficient reading.

Install Smart Summariser today and start saving time with AI-powered summaries!
